QuestData.Title: Phantasmagoria
QuestData.Description:
<The strange mote of otherworldly energy glows with an erratic rhythm.
Ve'nari may find it of interest.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Warped Phantasma to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText: How beautiful. That this Phantasma is able to exist outside of the tower at all is unbelievable. Something is most curious about it's nature...further study is needed.
